directions: Preheat grill to medium. Combine first five ingredients and salt and pepper to taste in a bowl. Lightly mix together and form into 6 patties. Brush them with oil.
Grill burgers for 4 to 5 minutes per side or until internal temp is 165Â°F. Toast buns for 2 minutes. Serve burgers on buns; garnish with barbecue sauce and cabbage, if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, drained and chopped
title: Turkey Gorgonzola Burgers
